WorkItem.ClosedComment: The root cause of this issue is the need to set up the comparison charts with multiple available enchants, like how we show multiple items that have different gemmings. There is already a feature request open for this.
WorkItem.Description:
It's not a mistake or a bug,
but the comparison is bad between an enchanted One-Hand + Off-Hand
and a Two-Hand Weapon.
e.g. Druid:
The enchant for one Hand ist +63 spell power.
You will see that a lot of one-hand weapons (+ chosen off hand) are better than several two hand weapons.
Why?
The tool does not compare between two enchanted weapons. It compares the enchanted one hand + off hand
with the un-enchanted tow hand.
It changes completely when you choose two hand weapon with the +83 spell power enchant.
The two-hand weapon will be now much stronger than several one hand (+ off hand [which is currently deactivated])
Â 
The tool should compare both (one-hand + off-hand) and (two hand) with best enchants!
WorkItem.Summary: Comparison between enchanted One-Hand and Two-Hand Weapons

Comments.Message: You should really be using the optimizer to make those comparisons
